Key Match Events: Paul George hyper-extended his left knee in a pre-season victory over the Atlanta Hawks
Post-Match Reflections: Sixers coach Nick Nurse said he was hopeful George would be back in action 'right away'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul George was guarding Atlanta's Jalen Johnson in the first half when he appeared to plant his leg awkwardly
Others: George told the Philadelphia Inquirer that he felt the hyper-extension and knew he needed to have the knee examined but added 'I'm not too concerned about it.'
